channel.title: My server wont run ! on any client!
channel.description:
i have created my server i haved coded everything in client.java e.t.c
anyway the problem is
i cant run my server it just doesnt want to work with the correct ip address when i load up my own personal client and enter the ip addres and port it wont work it says error connecting to server and also i have tried other clients still same thing !
regards,
zorothon

item.title: My server wont run ! on any client!

Let me check mine, then ill help you.

@zorothon wrote:

yes thats what i thought but then it just stays like thats and does nothing [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 07:48:23 AM[/size][hr]sorry for double post but i need help with loadin server when i put my ip in which is 82.32.165.93 on moparscape and i put in the port 43594 its says error

help ?

item.title: My server wont run ! on any client!
item.dc:creator: @Moove Moove
item.description:
@Moove wrote:

0.0.0.0 = Localhost IP
5555 = Port

It appears like that to everyone so its completely normal.

Read full topic
